items.title: Police charge 18-year-old man allegedly involved in fatal Ascot Vale stabbing
items.summary: Police charge an 18-year-old man with offences including intentionally causing injury and affray, following the incident that claimed the life of a 40-year-old in Ascot Vale on Sunday afternoon.

items.title: One of PNG's rare conjoined twins dies after urgent surgery in Sydney, brother survives
items.summary: Surgeons have separated a rare set of conjoined twins after they were urgently airlifted from Papua New Guinea to Australia, but only one of the boys has survived.

items.title: Men jailed for gang raping women at Newcastle bucks weekend have convictions quashed
items.summary: Marius Hawell, his brother and a friend have had their convictions thrown out on grounds of appeal, after being handed jail sentences of between nine and 14 years.

items.title: Thailand launches air strikes amid new border clashes with Cambodia

items.title: Water leak at the Louvre museum damages hundreds of works

items.title: Cleveland Dodd's care in Unit 18 'inhumane', coroner examining youth detention death finds
items.summary: Western Australia's first recorded death in youth detention was predictable, a coroner finds, declaring the care of 16-year-old Cleveland Dodd was "inhumane" and "reminiscent of 19th century jails". WARNING: This story contains the name and image of an Indigenous person who has died.

items.title: South Australians prisons in lockdown as staff hold 24-hour 'stop-work'

items.summary: Bo Popowski's defence lawyer told the courtroom this was the first time he had heard the word murder used for the case and that he would need time to speak to his client.
